definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: It should be done by the hub or connectors.
sentences.chinese: 这项工作应当由集线器或连接器完成。

sentences.english: Medusa's terrible head when i have a glance with it.
sentences.chinese: 第一眼看到这集线器就觉得像梅杜莎的笨脑袋。

sentences.english: It is deployed as one or more "hub" components.
sentences.chinese: 它作为一个或多个“集线器”组件部署。

sentences.english: As with hubs, Ethernet implementations of network switches are the most common.
sentences.chinese: 和集线器一样，网络交换机的以太网实现是最常见的。

sentences.english: Some English three-speed front hubs have a built in generator.
sentences.chinese: 有些英语三速前集线器有内置发电机。

sentences.english: These multiport bridges were called switching hubs or Ethernet switches.
sentences.chinese: 这些多端口网桥叫交换式集线器或以太网交换机。

sentences.english: The central hub has malfunctioned in the network.
sentences.chinese: 主要的集线器已经在网路里失灵。

sentences.english: For it, iCloud is now the hub.
sentences.chinese: 对于它来说，iCloud现在就是集线器。

sentences.english: Make sure that the network or any intermediate hubs are not a bottleneck.
sentences.chinese: 请确保网络或任何中间集线器都不会成为瓶颈。

definition: network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)
